page.title: 08Women's groups in Bookham
page.content:
Local women strongly support 7 Women's Institutes, a W.I.market, a Housewives Register, 2 Townswomen's Guilds, 5 Church Groups and a mother and toddler group.
These offer social and educational opportunities for women through talks, classes, discussions, music, drama, sport and other activities. They participate in local community projects, helping the elderly and young, supporting and improving facilities. Many also take action over wider national and international issues. Many of their members are working women rather than isolated housewives, but the popularity of such groups shows a continuing need for opportunities for women outside work and home.
